rules_text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is one plus the number of counters on this creature.
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact or enchantment: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It gains trample until end of turn.
notes:
!tokens colorless Construct XXERR
